meanings.definition: To assess or evaluate the authenticity or quality of something, especially in a specialized field.
meanings.sent1: She was expertizing the antique vase to determine its true value.
meanings.sent2: The jeweler spent hours expertizing the diamond to confirm its authenticity.
meanings.sent3: The detective expertizing the crime scene found a hidden clue under the table.
meanings.sent4: Her keen eye for detail made her expertizing skills unmatched in the art world.
meanings.sent5: Expertizing requires a careful examination of every detail to make accurate judgments.

meanings.definition: The act of providing expert opinion or analysis on a particular subject.
meanings.sent1: His expertizing on the matter helped the team make an informed decision.
meanings.sent2: The expertizing of the scientist was highly valued in the research community.
meanings.sent3: The cat's expertizing on the best napping spots in the house was quite amusing.
meanings.sent4: Her expertizing on fashion trends was like a guiding light for the industry.
meanings.sent5: The expertizing of the professor made the complex topic easy to understand for students.
